id.description: The unique identifier for the category. It is automatically generated, you should not change it unless you know what you are doing.

name.description: (Optional) Name for the category. If not provided, the name of the category will be the name of the directory.

role.description: The role to apply the permissions to.

permissions.description: (Optional) Permissions for this role within this category.

description: Defines a category for the Discord server.
